business.headline: Adani Group revives US investment plans amid ongoing bribery case: ReportFor now, Adani Group's US footprint remains minimal. Past talks with American companies about petrochemical projects in Texas never led to major deals.

Paytm clarifies FEMA allegations on acquired subsidiaries. Details hereThe company is seeking legal advice and will take necessary steps to resolve the matter through appropriate regulatory processes in line with applicable laws.

US food delivery firm Grubhub lays off 500 employees. Here's whyGrubhub is laying off as many as 500 employees, over 20 per cent of its workforce, following its acquisition by Wonder. The layoffs, spanning all departments, aim to streamline operations as the company integrates with its new parent.

Tuhin Kanta Pandey assumes charge as 11th Sebi chairmanTuhin Kanta Pandey took charge as the 11th Sebi chairman, succeeding Madhabi Puri Buch, who completed her tenure. A former Finance Secretary, Pandey has been appointed for three years.

India to remain fastest growing major economy with 6.5% growth in FY26: IMFIndia's strong economic performance, the IMF said, provides an opportunity for the country to advance critical and challenging structural reforms to realise the ambition of becoming an advanced economy by 2047.

From record highs to a five-month slide: Where are Sensex, Nifty headed?From record highs to relentless losses, Dalal Street's dream run has turned into a nightmare in just a few months. Is there any relief in sight for investors or is there more pain ahead?

Zerodha's Nithin Kamath flags sharp drop in trading activity amid market crashThe stock market fell sharply on Friday, with the Sensex dropping 1,414 points and the Nifty slipping below 22,150. The heavy selling wiped out nearly Rs 9 lakh crore in market value.

Citigroup employee's typo nearly led to $81 trillion blunder. Details hereThe payment was initially overlooked by two employees before a third employee caught it. Citi later reported the incident as a 'near miss' to the Federal Reserve and the Office of the Comptroller of the Currency (OCC).

Don't miss these money deadlines in March 2025: Special FDs, ITR, and more In case you have missed reporting income or made an error in your ITR, you can still fix it. The final deadline for filing an  updated return (ITR-U) is March 31, 2025.

Sensex falls 1,400 points as trade war fears rattle D-Street, Rs 9 lakh crore goneStock market crash: During today's trading session, Dalal Street plunged as Sensex tumbled 1,414 points and Nifty sank below 22,150 amid global trade war fears and foreign sell-off, erasing nearly Rs 9 lakh crore in market value.
GDP grows at 6.2% in Q3 2024-25, up from 5.6% in Q2For the financial year 2023-24, India recorded a real GDP growth rate of 9.2%, marking the highest annual growth in the past 12 years.

Nifty posts longest monthly losing streak in 29 years, over Rs 90 lakh crore goneForeign outflows, weak earnings and global uncertainty have wiped out over Rs 90 lakh crore in investor wealth from  since September 2024, when Nifty hit an all-time high of 26,277.35.

Technicolor India shuts down, over 3,000 employees affected The company currently employs 3,200 people across India, with nearly 3,000 in Bengaluru alone. The sudden move has left several employees in shock.

RuPay Debit Select Card: Check new features effective from April 1, 2025RuPay Debit Select Cardholders can enjoy one complimentary domestic airport lounge visit each quarter and two international lounge visits a year at participating lounges (conditions apply).

India needs tariff cuts, reforms to boost investments: World Bank The World Bank report titled 'Economic Memorandum India' also highlights that for India to become a high-income country by 2047, its per capita income must grow nearly eight times current levels.

What's your best asset in 20s? Not stocks or trading, says Radhika GuptaRadhika Gupta cautioned that young professionals might be focusing on passive income too early. She believes that the best investment in your 20s is not stocks or trading but your talent and time.

Smallcap, midcap indices set for worst month in 5 years. More pain ahead?In 2025 so far, mid-cap stocks have fallen 16%, while small-cap stocks have slumped 21%. In comparison, the benchmark Nifty 50 is down 6.7%.

NPCI introduces UPI Lite's 'Transfer Out' feature. All details hereAll issuer banks and UPI Apps must implement the required changes by March 31, 2025, as mentioned in NPCI's circular dated February 21, 2025

EPFO retains 8.25% interest rate on provident fund deposits for 2024-25In February 2024, the Employees' Provident Fund Organisation (EPFO) had increased the interest rate on EPF marginally to 8.25 per cent for 2023-24, from 8.15 per cent in 2022-23.

Explained: Why IT stocks like TCS, Infosys, Tech Mahindra are falling todayTech Mahindra was the biggest loser among IT stocks, down nearly 5.5% at the time publishing this report. Wipro was also down nearly 5%. Major IT firms such as TCS, Infosys and HCLTech were also down nearly 4% each.

Portfolio in red? Top mutual funds to consider amid stock market downturnInvestors are now looking for safer investment options as the markets have seen a huge correction. Mutual funds that balance risk and growth are a preferred choice among many.

Explained: Why Premier Energies shares tumbled up to 8% today The company's share price fell to a day's low of Rs 850 on the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE). At around 12 pm, shares of Premier Energies were down 4.46% to Rs 881.80.

Ever heard of an alimony calculator? Here's how it worksAn alimony calculator is a tool that helps in determining the estimated financial support one spouse may need to pay the other after a divorce or separation.
India, EU aim to seal free trade pact by year-endThe EU is India's biggest trade partner in goods, with trade hitting $137.5 billion in 2023-24, nearly doubling in ten years.
Meta fires 20 employees for leaking internal information to mediaThe latest round of firings came following a recent series of reports based on Mark Zuckerberg's meetings with employees.

Stock market crash: 5 things investors should know as Sensex plunges 1,400 pointsStock market crash: Retail investors, already grappling with losses, are left wondering whether this correction will continue or if a recovery is on the horizon. Here are 5 things investors need to know
Sensex crashes 1,400 points: Why stock market is falling todayAt 12:53 PM, the S&P BSE Sensex was down 1,371.42 points at 73,241.01, while the NSE Nifty50 dropped 421.15 points to 22,123.90.

Bitcoin tumbles 5% to fall below $80,000 for first time since NovemberThe decline comes amid uncertainty over US President Donald Trump's trade policies, regulatory decisions on cryptocurrency, and concerns among investors after a major hack in rival digital currency ether.

Sensex plunges nearly 1,000 points, Nifty tumbles over 1%; IT, auto stocks bleedThe S&P BSE Sensex lost nearly 977.03 points to 73,635.40 at 10:06 am, while the NSE Nifty50 declined 303.60 points to 22,241.45 at 10:06 am.

Karnataka labour department finds no law violation in Infosys layoffs: ReportThe final report is expected to be submitted within a week, and a copy will also be sent to the Union labour department for further review.

Who is Tuhin Kanta Pandey? A look at his key roles in the governmentThe Appointments Committee of the Cabinet (ACC) has approved Tuhin Kanta Pandey's appointment for a term of three years. He is a 1987-batch Indian Administrative Service (IAS) officer from the Odisha cadre.

Tuhin Kanta Pandey appointed new Sebi Chairman, to succeed Madhabi Puri BuchTuhin Kanta Pandey, the current Finance Secretary, has been appointed as the new Chairman of market regulator Sebi. He will succeed Madhabi Puri Buch.

Amazon India hit with $39 million penalty for apparel trademark violationThe lawsuit was filed by Lifestyle Equities, the owner of the Beverly Hills Polo Club (BHPC) horse trademark. It claimed that Amazon India was selling apparel with a similar logo at lower prices.

Fixed vs floating interest rates: Which option to choose?Floating home loan interest rates are usually lower than fixed rates. Hence, they are more appealing when rates are likely to dip or stay stable.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Sensex, Nifty end flat despite banking and financial sector boostThe S&P BSE Sensex added 10.31 points to close at 74,612.43, while the NSE Nifty50 lost 2.50 points to end at 22,545.05.
Why NPS should be a part of your retirement plan? 5 things to knowWhen compared to fixed deposits (FDs) and Public Provident Funds (PPF), NPS offers superior returns over the long run.

Explained: Why NBFC stocks may offer stability in choppy marketsThe RBI's decision to ease certain loan rules and delay stricter regulations on capital requirements has improved sentiment in the financial sector. This has made NBFC stocks attractive options for investors.

Bitcoin sees 10% drop this week: 5 reasons behind the fallThe largest crypto has witnessed a decline of more than 10% over the last seven days. This downward trend comes amid US President Donald Trump's aggressive trade policies and EU tariff threats.

Government seeks to cut states' share of central taxes: ReportBased on the expected tax collections for the ongoing financial year, a 1% swing in the states' share of tax revenue could give the central government about Rs 3,500 crore.

entertainment.headline: At sold-out Delhi concert, Honey Singh vows to bring Grammys to India. WatchAt his Delhi concert, Honey Singh wowed fans with his hits and vowed to bring a Grammy to India, inspired by AR Rahman's Oscars win. He also expressed his deep love for Delhi and its people.

Honey Singh set to perform in Delhi, excited fans rush to the venueSinger and rapper Honey Singh is set to perform in Delhi today as part of his ongoing Millionaire India tour. Ahead of the concert, excited fans were seen rushing to the venue as soon as the gates opened.

Honey Singh on online negativity against him: I've been here before YouTube existedSinger and rapper Honey Singh took a dig at those spreading negativity about him through YouTube podcasts. During his Lucknow concert last night, he also spoke about his lifestyle changes.

Shreya Ghoshal's X account hacked: Tried every thing in my capacityRenowned singer Shreya Ghoshal has disclosed that her X account has been compromised since February 13. Despite efforts, she remains unable to access or delete the account.
Splitsvilla 15's Rushali Yadav-Harsh Arora engaged: Just perfectly usSplitsvilla 15 contestants Rushali Yadav and Harsh Arora are now engaged. The couple fell in love on the show.

Nadaaniyan trailer: Ibrahim, Khushi's romance comes with a priceIbrahim Ali Khan is all set to making his acting debut in Nadaaniyan, a love story with a secret deal. Also starring Khushi Kapoor, the film explores romance, ambition, and chaos. It will start streaming on Netflix from March 7.

Honey Singh returns to Delhi for sold-out Millionaire concert: What to expectYo Yo Honey Singh's Millionaire India Tour hits Delhi with a sold-out show, 20,000 fans, top celebs, and a surprise setlist. His parents will attend the concert, making this emotional homecoming extra special.

Honey Singh wishes to team up with Diljit Dosanjh, urges fans to make it happenSinger Honey Singh, currently touring India for his Millionaire India Tour, expressed his desire to collaborate with Diljit Dosanjh again during his recent concert in Lucknow. He urged fans to tag the Peaches singer, hoping to reunite for a new project.

Shabana Azmi reacts to comparisons between Dabba Cartel and Saas, Bahu Aur FlamingoShabana Azmi addressed concerns over comparisons between her Netflix show Dabba Cartel and Dimple Kapadia's Saas, Bahu Aur Flamingo, emphasising the unique elements of each series.

Singer Palash Sen on Diljit's concert culture remark, Euphoria 2.0 and remixesEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen opened up about Diljit Dosanjh's controversial concert culture remark, the rebranding of the band and more in an exclusive interaction with India Today Digital. Sen recently collaborated with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song, Mahakal Chalo.

Alter Ego review: Blackpink's Lisa's album is versatile and powerfulLisa of Blackpink releases her solo album Alter Ego. With a total of 15 songs and several collaborations, the album has a lot to take away from, but Lisa shines the brightest in her solo elements.

Ek Badnaam Aashram 3 part 2 review: Baba Nirala's journey meets a dramatic endReleased-Thu Feb 27, 2025Prakash Jha's most anticipated series, Aashram Season 3 Part 2, is currently streaming on MX Player. The series focusses on Baba Nirala's fate and how his entire kingdom crashes down because of Pammi's quest for revenge.

Dabba Cartel review: Shabana Azmi is a silent lioness in a challenging storyReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025'Dabba Cartel' is supposed to be a powerful story of five women who team up to run a cartel in Mumbai. But, the Netflix series ends up becoming a mushy pie.

G-Dragon's Übermensch album is out: A long-overdue masterpieceK-pop King G-Dragon is back with a new album after over a decade. Titled Übermensch, the album is a long-overdue masterpiece the fans deserved.

Japanese woman summoned for kissing BTS' Jin without consentA Japanese woman has been summoned by the South Korean police after she kissed BTS member Jin without his consent during a fan event held last summer.

Suzhal The Vortex 2 review: This crime-drama is trapped in the vortex of clichesReleased-Fri Feb 28, 2025Suzhal - The Vortex 2 review: Created by Pushkar and Gayatri, Suzhal - The Vortex 2 is a crime drama that suffers from overstuffed ideas. The show has interesting ideas, but it gets lost in the overstretched screenplay.

Meghan Markle discusses food, music and Korea in new glimpse of 'With Love, Meghan'Meghan Markle and chef Roy Choi bond over food and the culture of South Korea as they discuss Karoake bars and music in the new promo for her Netflix show, 'With Love, Meghan'.

Composer Pritam thanks Mumbai Police for arresting studio theft culpritMusic composer Pritam expressed gratitude towards the Mumbai Police for capturing the suspect involved in a Rs 40 lakh theft from his studio. He praised their efforts in a heartfelt Instagram post.

The Boys 5: Supernatural actors Jensen Ackles, Jared Padalecki to reuniteThe Boys Season 5 will be an exciting reunion as Soldier Boy Jensen Ackles will be joined by his Supernatural co-stars Jared Padalecki and Misha Collins.

Suits LA review: Sass, swag and secrets in a soggy spin-offReleased-Mon Feb 24, 2025'Suits LA' has the flavour of the original 'Suits', but Teddy Black is no Harvey Spector, and you will be reminded of it, despite all the pizazz in the show.

Oscar-nominated Savan Kotecha to find India's first global boy bandSavan Kotecha is launching a nationwide hunt for India's first global boy band. Partnering with Universal Music, he aims to build a teen pop economy and create Indian stars for the world stage.

Undercover High School review: Korean 'Main Hoon Na' with more thrillsReleased-Fri Feb 21, 2025Undercover High School review: It is a thrilling Korean series blending action and comedy, reminiscent of 'Main Hoon Na', where a disgraced spy navigates high school challenges while on a mission to find missing gold.

O Saathi Re: Imtiaz Ali's Netflix series is a modern story with a vintage heartNetflix has released the first look of its new series O Saathi Re, starring Avinash Tiwary, Aditi Rao Hydari, and Arjun Rampal. The series, directed by Arif Ali, will be an 'ode to vintage love in modern times'.

Prajakta Koli hilariously dances to 'Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar…' at sangeet. WatchPrajakta Koli danced to Mere Husband Mujhko Piyar Nahin Karte at her sangeet, leaving guests in splits. She married Vrishank Khanal in Karjat on February 25.

Vijay Yesudas reacts to fake news about father Yesudas's hospitalisationReports were rife that playback singer Yesudas was hospitalised in Chennai due to age-related illness. His son and playback singer Vijay Yesudas exclusively spoke to India Today and shut down the rumours.

Sex Education actor Alexander Westwood jailed for 15 years for sex offencesSex Education actor Alexander Westwood received a 15-year prison sentence for multiple sex offenses. The case has captured widespread media attention due to Westwood's role in the popular Netflix show.

Aashram 3 Part 1 ending explained: Will Pammi's revenge end Baba Nirala's reign?With Aashram Season 3 Part 2 releasing on February 27, let us take a look at how the season ended on a cliffhanger with Baba Nirala's misuse of power and a change in dynamics.

Amit Trivedi says Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay was 'unfortunate'Amit Trivedi, in an interview with India Today Digital, discussed the controversy over Jasleen Royal's opening act for Coldplay's India tour and whether it would impact on the image of Indian artists.

Rapper Kanye West trying to save marriage with Bianca Censori: ReportKanye West is reportedly trying to prevent his marriage with Bianca Censori from ending. An insider reveals that Bianca is considering divorce, and Kanye is panicking.

Singer Palash Sen on working with Akshay Kumar, not being 'accepted' by BollywoodEuphoria's lead vocalist Palash Sen spoke to India Today Digital about collaborating with Bollywood star Akshay Kumar on the song Mahakal Chalo, work opportunities in the Hindi film industry, and more in an exclusive interaction.

Actors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalwani to separate after 9 years of marriageActors Aman Verma and Vandana Lalvani are separating after nine-years of marriage. Amid growing speculation, Aman has addressed the rumours about their relationship.

Baalveer actor Dev Joshi marries girlfriend Aarti, first pics outBaalveer actor Dev Joshi married his girlfriend Aarti in a beautiful ceremony. The wedding festivities, including haldi and mehndi, were spectacular and captured in stunning photos.

Be Happy: Abhishek Bachchan, Inayat Verma series to stream in MarchThe streaming date of Abhishek Bachchan and Inayat Verma-starrer Be Happy is out. It promises to be a touching film about a single father's journey to support his daughter's dream of performing on a dance reality show.

A Man on the Inside: Ted Danson's charming comedy deserves more loveA Man on the Inside is a warm and witty series which tackles multiple subjects, including loss, new beginnings and, well, crime. The Ted Danson-starrer is currently streaming on Netflix.

Shreya Ghoshal on Chikni Chameli: Embarrassed when 5-year-old girls sing itShreya Ghoshal says she feels embarrassed when young girls sing Chikni Chameli, stressing that lyrics should be written more thoughtfully, as music and films have a deep impact on society.

Hina Khan updates fans about cancer treatment: My chemo and surgery are overHina Khan recently gave an update about her cancer treatment. The actor mentioned that her chemotherapy and surgery are over.

Tanmay Bhat jokes about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his textsTanmay Bhat hilariously addressed the India's Got Latent controversy, joking about Ranveer Allahbadia ignoring his texts. The reaction video left fellow comedians laughing and also "triggered" them.

Singer Udit Narayan visits Maha Kumbh Mela with wife, expresses gratitude Singer Udit Narayan was among the latest celebrities to visit the holy city of Prayagraj for Maha Kumbh 2025. In an interview with ANI, he expressed his gratitude and congratulated Chief Minister Yogi Adityanath for the well-organised and efficient arrangements.

My Dearest Nemesis review: Chaotic chemistry makes even familiar trope workMy Dearest Nemesis features K-drama stars Moon Ga young and Choi Hyun-wook in the lead. It is available to stream on Viki. Here's our take on the romantic drama.

Internet calls Farah Khan 'insensitive' for mocking Gaurav Khanna's colour blindnessCelebrity MasterChef judge Farah Khan mocked TV actor Gaurav Khanna's colour blindness on the show. Following the same, the internet is outraged by her comments, criticising the filmmaker and calling her 'insensitive'.

general news.headline: Uttarakhand avalanche: Race to rescue 4 trapped, advanced drones to be deployedA massive avalanche hit a BRO camp near Mana village in Uttarakhand's Chamoli, burying 54 workers. Rescue teams have saved 50, but four died. The search continues for four missing labourers using advanced technology and aerial support.

UK stands with you: Starmer's royal welcome for Zelenskyy after Trump meltdownUnlike the tense atmosphere at the Oval Office during the talks with US President Donald Trump on ending the Ukraine war, Ukraine President Volodymyr Zelenskyy was warmly embraced by UK PM Keir Starmer in London.

Congress worker's body found in suitcase in Rohtak day before Haryana civic pollsThe body of 22-year-old Congress worker Himani Narwal was found stuffed in a suitcase in Haryana's Rohtak, prompting the police to launch an investigation and file a case. The party demanded a high-level probe into the matter.

India, New Zealand battle to keep momentum going in Group A finaleIndia and New Zealand are all set to continue their rivalry as both teams square off on Sunday, March 2 in the Champions Trophy 2025. Despite winning their 2 matches so far and qualifying for the semi-finals, both teams will be looking to keep the momentum going in Dubai.

Harvard journal forced to drop article on Khalistani terrorism, faces backlashThe Harvard International Review unpublished an article on Khalistani terrorism and its impact on India-Canada ties by an Indian student after complaints from Sikh organisations, including Harvard's Sikh Chaplain. Harvard is facing backlash for pulling out the article, and a petition has been started to hold the Ivy League university accountable.

Will die by my hand: Haryana woman beats up, bites mother over property disputeThe complainant told the police that his sister, Rita, and her husband had confined their mother in the house, depriving her of food and other necessities.

Vivek Ramaswamy faces online vitriol over barefoot interview: 'Third-world uncle'The interview was held at the 39-year-old Harvard graduate's residence last year. But the resurfaced images sparked a wave of negative comments, with some even saying, "we aren't in India".

Trump touts 'record-low' illegal immigration numbers: Invasion of US is overTrump claimed illegal immigration at the US-Mexico border hit historic lows in February, his first full month in office, citing strict policies. He reported 8,326 apprehensions, declaring, "The invasion of our country is over."

Why some Indian parents are homeschooling their kidsHomeschooling is an alternative form of education where parents or guardians take direct responsibility for teaching their children at home instead of sending them to a traditional school.

Adani Group revives US investment plans amid ongoing bribery case: ReportFor now, Adani Group's US footprint remains minimal. Past talks with American companies about petrochemical projects in Texas never led to major deals.

Video: Bilaspur mayor's oath faux pas, swears to uphold 'communalism'Puja Vidhani was elected the Mayor of Bilaspur after the ruling BJP registered a landslide victory in the recently-held urban body polls in Chhattisgarh.

Never write him off: Ponting backs Kohli to match Tendulkar's ODI recordChampions Trophy 2025: Former Australian skipper Ricky Ponting said that if Virat Kohli can stay hungry and fit, he can go on to break Sachin Tendulkar's record for most runs in ODI cricket.
Nasa's Blue Ghost to make historic landing on the Moon todayFirefly Aerospace's Blue Ghost is scheduled to touch down in Mare Crisium, a vast lunar plain on the near side of the Moon.

Saw deluge of snow rolling towards us: Survivors share Uttarakhand avalanche horrorUttarakhand avalanche survivors documented that they waded through 'feet-thick' snow to escape. Most of the rescued workers suffered back, head injuries.

Microsoft Outlook down globally, thousands of users locked out of their accountsLate Saturday night, Microsoft 365, which manages services such as Outlook, Excel and PowerPoint, said in a tweet that it had "identified a potential cause of impact and have reverted the suspected code to alleviate impact".

Trump makes English official language of US: 'Reinforce shared national values'President Donald Trump signed an executive order making English the official US language. The order lets government agencies and federally funded organisations decide whether to offer services in other languages, revoking a Clinton-era mandate requiring language assistance for non-English speakers.

After Virat Kohli, can Rohit Sharma light up Champions Trophy?India captain Rohit Sharma would want to have a big score against his name as India take on New Zealand in the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 on Sunday, March 1 in Dubai. The opening batter has scored 61 runs in the first two matches and a big knock from his bat hold India in good stead ahead of the semi finals.

Israel agrees on US plan to extend Gaza ceasefire, Hamas rejects proposalIsrael has agreed to a US proposal for a temporary ceasefire in Gaza for the Ramadan and Passover periods, a move rejected by Hamas, hours after the first phase of the truce deal was to expire.

New Zealand: The Holyfield to India's Tyson in ICC tournamentsEvery love story has a beginning, and so does every rivalry. India and New Zealand have played some riveting matches in the ICC tournaments in recent times. Here's how New Zealand are the Holyfield to India's Tyson in world cricket.

The actors shared a picture with each other on Saturday, sparking buzz about the film's highly-anticipated sequel.

Harrison Ford to miss Oscars 2025 after being diagnosed with shinglesHarrison Ford, 82, will skip the 97th Academy Awards due to shingles. He was set to present at the event on March 3. Conan O'Brien will host the ceremony. It will air in India on Jio Hotstar and Star Movies.

Mika Singh on why Bipasha Basu is 'out of work': The drama she created...Mika Singh revealed he quit refrains from producing a film after facing issues with Bipasha Basu on the web series Dangerous. He claimed Bipasha and Karan Singh Grover are 'out of work' now because of the tough time they gave him on Dangerous.

Rasha Thadani and Govinda's son Yashvardhan groove to Akhiyon Se Goli MaareActor Rasha Thadani shared a heartfelt birthday wish for Yashvardhan Ahuja, son of actor Govinda. The video showcased their camaraderie as they dance to the iconic Akhiyon Se Goli Maare.

Not the right person to ask: Vidarbha hero Karun Nair on national team call-upVidarbha batter Karun Nair scored a century in the second innings of the Ranji Trophy Final. Asked about a potential call-back in the Indian team, Nair said that he was not the right person to answer this question.

Facing Indian spinners not an easy task but we've got our plans: Glenn PhillipsNew Zealand all-rounder Glenn Phillips said that New Zealand have individual plans to counter India's spin threat in the upcoming ICC Champions Trophy 2025 clash against them. The two teams will square off on Sunday, March 1 in Dubai.

Having recently whitewashed India give New Zealand any advantage? Phillips answersNew Zealand all-rounder Glenn Phillips recently recalled New Zealand's 3-0 whitewash over India and said that their team will take the confidence from that result into the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 fixture between the two teams.

India vs New Zealand, all you need to know: Dubai pitch report, live streamingIndia and New Zealand are set to take on each other in the last group fixture of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025 on Sunday, March 2. Both teams have remained unbeaten in the tournament and have qualified for the semi finals.

Former Pakistan players should lift their team up instead of criticising: GavaskarLegendary India cricketer Sunil Gavaskar feels former Pakistan cricketers should think more about lifting their team up instead of criticising them vehemently. Pakistan got knocked out of the Champions Trophy 2025 without registering a single win in the tournament.

Watch: Karachi black cat invades field once again during England vs South AfricaThe infamous Karachi black cat invaded the National Stadium once again during the England vs South Africa game on Saturday, March 1. The cat appeared on the field while South Africa were batting.

India might prefer Australia over South Africa in semi-final: Sunil GavaskarLegendary India cricketer Sunil Gavaskar has said that India might prefer facing Australia over South Africa in the semi-final of the ICC Champions Trophy 2025. India's opponents will be finalised after their last group fixture against New Zealand.

New Zealand: The Holyfield to India's Tyson in ICC tournamentsEvery love story has a beginning, and so does every rivalry. India and New Zealand have played some riveting matches in the ICC tournaments in recent times. Here's how New Zealand are the Holyfield to India's Tyson in world cricket.

Pakistan refunds tickets for 2 Champions Trophy matches, but conditions applyPakistan Cricket Board has announced that they will refund tickets for two matches hosted at the Rawalpindi Stadium. However, certain conditions need to be fulfilled before the tickets are refunded.

Both Australia and South Africa to leave for Dubai ahead of semi-final vs IndiaSouth Africa and Australia are all set to fly to Dubai ahead of the semi-final fixture against India. The Men in Blue will be playing their semi final in Dubai irrespective of their position on the points table.

ENG vs SA: South Africa's Aiden Markram hit with injury just ahead of semisSouth Africa's Aiden Markram was hit by an injury during the clash against England and will only bat if required in the game. Markram had to leave the field due to a hamstring injury.

Karun Nair hundred sets up thrilling Day 5 in grand finaleRanji Trophy 2024-25, Vidarbha vs Kerala: Karun Nair scored an unbeaten 132 as Vidarbha took a lead of 286 runs at Stumps on Day 4 with six wickets left in their second innings.

Jemimah Rodrigues recreates Shah Rukh Khan's iconic pose vs Mumbai IndiansWPL 2025: Jemimah Rodrigues recreated Shah Rukh Khan's iconic pose when Delhi Capitals faced Mumbai Indians on February 28 at the M Chinnaswamy Stadium in Bengaluru.

Afghanistan knocked out, Proteas into semis after bowling England out for 179South Africa stormed into the semi-finals of the Champions Trophy after bowling out England for just 179 runs in the final match of Group B. With Proteas qualifying, Afghanistan were ruled out of the tournament.

MS Dhoni fumed at me during IPL 2018: ex teammate Michael HusseyFormer Chennai Super Kings batter and current batting coach Michael Hussey recalled an incident when MS Dhoni fumed at him during the Indian Premier League 2018.

D Gukesh climbs to career-high FIDE rating, Pragg back in Top 10World Champion D Gukesh climbed to his career-high ranking of No.3 in the FIDE rankings on Saturday, March 1. Gukesh gained 10 points, and now has a rating of 2787.

education.headline: The role of data analytics in modern advertising educationThis transformation also exercises a significant impact on the realm of 'advertising education.'

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Year by year, their fiery grip tightens, threatening ecosystems far and wide, now extending their reach to impact human lives.

Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.

Exclusive: Arvind Kejriwal claims 'BJP succession war, PM backing Amit Shah'Speaking exclusively to India Today TV, Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal claimed that there is a "succession war" within the BJP. He also claimed that the ruling party is "not fighting the Lok Sabha elections as a team".

4 medical students arrested in Bihar for appearing as proxies for NEET aspirantsFour MBBS students who appeared in place of NEET aspirants in the medical entrance exam were detained in Bihar's Purnea.

NEET-UG question paper not leaked, claims baseless: National Testing AgencyThe reports claiming question paper leak in the medical entrance exam NEET-UG are "completely baseless and without any ground", the National Testing Agency (NTA) has clarified.

The ABVP was leading at one point, but the Left eventually surged ahead and emerged victorious.

JNU students' body election on March 22 after 4 yearsThe Jawaharlal Nehru University Students' Union (JNUSU) polls will take place on March 22, more than four years after the last elections were held in September 2019.

UP 12th board exam math, biology papers leaked on WhatsApp, complaint filedThe mathematics and biology question papers for the Uttar Pradesh class 12 board exam were allegedly leaked on a WhatsApp group.

UP Police Constable recruitment exam cancelled days after paper leakThe Uttar Pradesh Police Constable recruitment exam held on February 17 and 18 was canceled due to a paper leak. The Chief Minister has announced a re-examination within the next six months.
